Strings.Text:
{scroll 0}I saw a research file in
this lab. It said that a{scroll 1}{clear 100}{scroll 0}great deal of research
on the Tyrant Virus exists{scroll 1}{clear 130}{scroll 0}right here.
We should blow this place up!{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}We are already into it\nover our heads. {scroll 1}{clear 90}{scroll 0}\nRebecca, can you do it?{scroll 1}{timed 50}
{scroll 0}Yes, Sir! I'll set off a\ntriggering system for a bomb.{scroll 1}{timed 130}
{scroll 0}Okay! Now we have a chance\nto escape.{scroll 1}{clear 102}{scroll 0}\nSee you outside the house.{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nRebecca, you're safe!{scroll 1}{clear 85}{scroll 0}I saw you in the garden. I've\ncaught up with you at last.{scroll 1}{timed 110}
{scroll 0}Well, I'm glad you're\nalright. Don't go out alone.{scroll 1}{clear 140}{scroll 0}\nYes, Sir!{scroll 1}{timed 40}
{scroll 0}Jill, don't be angry.\nI wanted you to wait for me.{scroll 1}{timed 140}
{scroll 0}Barry,\ndon't screw up again,{scroll 1}{clear 65}{scroll 0}like you did when you\ndropped that rope.{scroll 1}{timed 100}
{scroll 0}\nJill! You're here too!{scroll 1}{clear 70}{scroll 0}\nYes! You're here too?{scroll 1}{timed 70}
